You can install Final Cut Studio Pro 3 without a SN, but after you can only run the apps if you have a SN:

Just copy the Install Disc to your harddrive. Make right mouse button on "Install Final Cut Studo" and choose "Show original". Open with right mouse button "FinalCutStudio.mpkg" and choose "Show package content". Go to Contents - Plugins and open InstallerSections.plist with Texteditor and remove the lines:

License

AELicensingPlugin.bundle

Save the file and you can install Final Cut Studio 3...

This torrent has no content. content is the stuff that makes up the other 6 disks of the final cut studio package. this means that all the programs will run but there will be no sound files or motion presets that would usually be there. BECAUSE of this you'll have to uncheck anything extra in the install dialog except the main apps (eg motion content) or else you will get an error on install. EVERYTHING STILL RUNS NORMALLY THO. hope this helped clear things up.

If you do not have any kind of Final Cut Studio installed:

1: Download Torrent
2: Mount .toast file
3: Run installer
4: Enter Serial
5: De-Select all the content when asked - ONLY INSTALL THE PROGRAMS!
6: Enjoy


If you have Final Cut Studio 1 or 2 installed WITHOUT content

1: Visit http://www.digitalrebellion.com/fcs_remover.htm and download uninstaller
2: Use the uninstaller to remove everything
3: Download Torrent
4: Mount .toast file
5: Run installer
6: Enter Serial
7: De-Select all the content when asked - ONLY INSTALL THE PROGRAMS!
8: Enjoy


If you have Final Cut Studio 1 installed WITH content

1: Visit http://www.digitalrebellion.com/fcs_remover.htm and download uninstaller
2: Use the uninstaller to remove ONLY THE PROGRAMS. Leave the content alone.
3: Download Torrent
4: Mount .toast file
5: Run installer
6: Enter Serial
7: De-Select all the content when asked - ONLY INSTALL THE PROGRAMS!
8: Enjoy


If you have Final Cut Studio 2 installed WITH content

1: Visit http://www.digitalrebellion.com/fcs_remover.htm and download uninstaller
2: Use the uninstaller to remove THE PROGRAMS & MOTION CONTENT.
3: Download the torrent on this page
4: Mount .toast file
5: Run installer
6: Enter Serial
7: De-Select all the content when asked - ONLY INSTALL THE PROGRAMS!
8: Download this torrent http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5050589/Final_Cut_Studio_3_-_Complete_Suite - open the torrent in transmission or whatever and only download the Motion Disc.
9: Once motion disc is downloaded browse to it and find 'installer --> MotionContent.mpkg'. Run that.
8: Enjoy


Ideally you want to already have Studio 2 content installed. Obviously if you do, you don't have to do the downloading the Motion disc, you can just follow the instructions for as if you have final cut studio 1 installed, and stick with the motion content from studio 2.

On a side note just incase it's helpful to someone out there, I had a few probs getting this going on my (vanilla) Hackintosh. It was telling me that I needed more vram (i have 2000 =P) so would quit the installer saying that my system was not meeting min specs. So...


To bypass Final Cut Studio 3 requirements test during installation.

1: On the FCS3 installation image navigate to 'Install Final Cut Studio' package, right-click and choose Show Original
2: A new Finder window should open with FinalCutStudio.mpkg hi-lighted. Right-click and choose Show Package Contents
3: Inside FinalCutStudio.mpkg, navigate to Contents/Resources/Requirements Checker.app, right-click it and choose Show Package Contents
4: Inside Requirements Checker.app, navigate to Contents/Resources and open file minsys.plist for editing
5: Replace all "block" with "warn" and save file.

gfooty, I had the same problem- FCP is looking for  Ethernet connection 'en0'. When the program doesn't find it becuase it has a different name (liek en2 or whatever) it will crash the program.. You must go to network in the system preferences and erase the current network connection (select it and then use the minus sign to get rid of it. Then reboot and it will be fixed.
